# Learnings: design-oracle

<!-- Auto-generated by /conductor-finish -->

## Commands

- `bd close <id1> --reason completed && bd update <id2> --status in_progress` - Chain close and claim in one command
- `oracle(task="6-dimension design audit", files=[...])` - Amp's built-in oracle tool for design review
- `Task(description="Oracle Design Review", prompt="...")` - Non-Amp platform fallback for oracle

## Gotchas

- **Verification paths**: Skill files live at `.claude/skills/` not `skills/` - verification scripts must use correct paths
- **Idempotent updates**: When `## Oracle Audit` section exists, find start marker → find next `##` → replace entire section
- **Platform detection**: Check for oracle tool availability before deciding dispatch method (Amp vs Task)

## Patterns

- **6-dimension audit framework**: Completeness, Feasibility, Risks, Dependencies, Ordering, Alignment
- **Severity classification**: CRITICAL (blocks in FULL) vs MINOR (warning only)
- **Mode-based behavior**: FULL mode HALTs on critical gaps, SPEED mode WARNs and continues
